name: Feel the Bern Badge for Bernie Sanders
author: Spokane WordPress Development

sections.description: Show your support for Bernie Sanders by adding a badge to the top corner of your website. It comes in several colors, positions and styles! Feel the Bern!
sections.installation:
Activate the plugin and then visit the settings page to choose a color, position and style for your Bern Badge.

You can also turn off the badge on mobile devices from the settings page.
sections.faq:
What are you feeling?

The bern, baby. I’m feelin’ the bern.

Do you offer badges in different languages?

Not yet. But if you speak another language and are willing to help translate them, please contact us!
